Name: Santos Pablo
description:
He lives with his family. He works in agriculture and thus obtains his principal income. He grows coffee and plantains of good quality, because he provides adequate care to then be able to sell at an excellent price. He is very responsible with his crops and likes to give excellent maintenance.

He requests the loan to buy fertilizers and mulch for his crops, to have very good production. He is very pleased with the kindness and good treatment received from Prisma and Kiva. He is very grateful for the support received.

April 2023.
